title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When viewing the cross-reference for a code file, there is an incorrect display of joinpoints assigned to advice.
EB:
When performing the following steps:
1. Select line 22 and note that you observe 5 joinpoints (should only be 3).
2. Select line 68 and note that you see zero joinpoints (should be 2 here).
3. Right-click the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises'; note that you see all 5 joinpoints.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the code file.
2. Navigate to line 22 and observe the joinpoints displayed.
3. Move to line 68 and note the absence of joinpoints.
4. Right-click on the marker at line 68, select 'advises,' and observe the displayed joinpoints.
